Interface IKnowledgeManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KnowledgeManager, LoggingKnowledgeManager, RepositoryKnowledgeManager

    public interface IKnowledgeManager

    • Method Detail

      • getKnowledge

        java.lang.Object getKnowledge(java.lang.String knowledgePath,
                            ISession session)
                              throws KMException
        Retrieves knowledge from the knowledge repository, defined by both knowledgePath and structure. This method is session oriented.
        Parameters:
        knowledgePath - nesting at which the knowledge structure should be rooted
        session - a session object within which all the retrieval should be performed
        Returns:
        retrieved knowledge object of type structure
        Throws:
        KMException - thrown whenever there is a problem accessing the knowledge repository

      • takeKnowledge

        java.lang.Object takeKnowledge(java.lang.String knowledgePath,
                             ISession session)
                               throws KMException
        Withdraws the knowledge from the knowledge repository. This method is session oriented.
        Parameters:
        knowledgePath - nesting at which the knowledge structure should be rooted
        type - Knowledge structure (Knowledge Interface)
        session - a session object within which all the withdrawals should be performed
        Returns:
        retrieved knowledge object of type structure
        Throws:
        KMException - thrown whenever there is a problem accessing the knowledge repository

      • alterKnowledge

        void alterKnowledge(java.lang.String knowledgePath,
                  java.lang.Object value,
                  ISession session)
                    throws KMException
        Alters knowledge object in the knowledge repository. This method is session oriented.
        Parameters:
        knowledgePath - nesting at which the knowledge object should be stored
        value - knowledge to be stored
        type - Knowledge structure (Knowledge Interface)
        session - a session object within which all the put operations should be performed
        Throws:
        KMException - thrown whenever there is a problem accessing the knowledge repository

      • putKnowledge

        void putKnowledge(java.lang.String knowledgePath,
                java.lang.Object value,
                ISession session)
                  throws KMException
        Puts knowledge object to the knowledge repository. This method is session oriented.
        Parameters:
        knowledgePath - nesting at which the knowledge object should be stored
        value - knowledge to be stored
        type - Knowledge structure (Knowledge Interface)
        session - a session object within which all the put operations should be performed
        Throws:
        KMException - thrown whenever there is a problem accessing the knowledge repository

      • createSession

        ISession createSession()
        Creates ISession instance used for enclosing all knowledge operations within a single session.
        Returns:
        ISession object instance.

      • registerListener

        boolean registerListener(IKnowledgeChangeListener listener)
        Register a listener that should be notified by the knowledge manager whenever a specified properties are changing.
        Parameters:
        listener - listening object

      • unregisterListener

        boolean unregisterListener(IKnowledgeChangeListener listener)
        Unregisters the listener that has been registered earlier.
        Parameters:
        listener - listening object

      • setListenersActive

        void setListenersActive(boolean on)

      • getKnowledge

        java.lang.Object getKnowledge(java.lang.String knowledgePath)
                              throws KMException
        Retrieves knowledge from the knowledge repository, defined by knowledgePath.
        Parameters:
        absolute - name (knowledge path) of the property to be retrieved
        Returns:
        retrieved knowledge object
        Throws:
        KMException - thrown whenever there is a problem accessing the knowledge repository

      • takeKnowledge

        java.lang.Object takeKnowledge(java.lang.String knowledgePath)
                               throws KMException
        Withdraws the knowledge from the knowledge repository.
        Parameters:
        knowledgePath - nesting at which the knowledge structure should be rooted
        Returns:
        retrieved knowledge object of type structure
        Throws:
        KMException - thrown whenever there is a problem accessing the knowledge repository

      • alterKnowledge

                  java.lang.Object value)
                    throws KMException
        Alters knowledge object in the knowledge repository.
        Parameters:
        knowledgePath - nesting at which the knowledge object should be stored
        value - knowledge to be stored
